definition: nomadic/to move about in search of pasture/to rove around as a nomad
to herd/to breed livestock/to govern (old)/government official (old)

sentences.english: Comes mounted on Nomad 2 shelf, with pre-wired fuse.
sentences.chinese: 來自遊牧2貨架上，與前有線保險絲。
遊牧文化該怎樣繼續下去？

sentences.english: In the beginning, they believed in Tengri Shamanism and were nomadic.
sentences.chinese: 他們最初信奉薩滿教，過着遊牧生活。

sentences.english: Urban nomads have started appearing only in the past few years.
sentences.chinese: 都市遊牧民僅僅是過去幾年纔出現的一族。

sentences.english: The theme of the Kyrgyzstan Pavilion is the peaceful coexistence of its nomadic people with nature.
sentences.chinese: 吉爾吉斯坦館的主題是遊牧族與自然地和平共存。
土庫曼人向來是遊牧民族。

sentences.english: A member of a Berber people of northeast Algeria.
sentences.chinese: 一個撒哈拉沙漠遊牧的柏柏爾民族成員。

sentences.english: His new film is an epic of the nomads.
sentences.chinese: 他新拍的這部電影是遊牧民族的一部史詩。

sentences.english: Then, the Song court was forced to move to Hangzhou as its imperial court because it could not push back the nomadic invaders.
sentences.chinese: 那時南宋朝廷不敵遊牧民族的進攻，被迫轉移到杭州。

sentences.english: Life is also not easy for the nomadic shepherds.
sentences.chinese: 對於這些遊牧部落來說，生活是很艱難的。

sentences.english: The townsmen despise and cheat the nomads.
sentences.chinese: 城鎮居民輕視和詐騙遊牧民。

sentences.english: Many of the Kazakh and Mongol stock-herders are still at least seminomadic.
sentences.chinese: 許多哈薩克和蒙古族的牧民依然過着半遊牧的生活。

sentences.english: Masais are 3)nomads who travel all over with their animals, looking for 4)pasture.
sentences.chinese: 馬賽人是趕着牧羣四處尋找牧地的遊牧民族。

sentences.english: While in the remote countryside, voting is taking place inside gers , tent-like structures that nomads use as a home.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古包是一種帳篷結構的建築，遊牧民們在裏面生活。

sentences.english: The nomadic population of Afghanistan lives in tents.
sentences.chinese: 而阿富汗的遊牧人口則住在帳篷裏。

sentences.english: Humans have always migrated and travelled, without necessarily living nomadic lives.
sentences.chinese: 人類總是在遷徙和旅行，而不必過遊牧式的生活。

definition: Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
axle/(fig.) central element/key element/axis (alliance of nations)
Paiwan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
